
ğŸ› ï¸ Welcome to Stouputils Documentation
=======================================


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/Stoupy51/stouputils?logo=github&label=GitHub
  :target: https://github.com/Stoupy51/stouputils/releases/latest

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/stouputils?logo=python&label=PyPI%20downloads
  :target: https://pypi.org/project/stouputils/


ğŸ“š Overview
-----------
Stouputils is a collection of utility modules designed to simplify and enhance the development process. 
It includes a range of tools for tasks such as execution of doctests, display utilities, decorators, as well as context managers.

ğŸš€ Project Structure
-------------------
.. code-block:: bash

   stouputils/
   â”œâ”€â”€ continuous_delivery/
   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ github.py             # ğŸ“¦ GitHub utilities that are very specific (upload_to_github)
   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ ...
   â”‚
   â”œâ”€â”€ print.py                  # ğŸ–¨ï¸ Display utilities
   â”œâ”€â”€ io.py                     # ğŸ’» I/O utilities (for file management, json, etc.)
   â”œâ”€â”€ decorators.py             # ğŸ¯ Decorators (silent, measure_time, error_handler, simple_cache, deprecated)
   â”œâ”€â”€ ctx.py                    # ğŸš« Context managers (Muffle)
   â”œâ”€â”€ archive.py                # ğŸ“¦ Archive utilities (zip, unzip)
   â”œâ”€â”€ parallel.py               # ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ¤â€ğŸ§‘ Parallel processing (multiprocessing, multithreading)
   â”œâ”€â”€ collections.py            # ğŸ§° Collection utilities (unique_list)
   â”œâ”€â”€ all_doctests.py           # âœ… Execution of all doctests of all modules for a given path
   â”œâ”€â”€ backup.py                 # ğŸ“¦ Backup utilities (create_delta_backup, consolidate_backups, backup_cli)
   â””â”€â”€ ...
